name: RevBright
overview:
RevBright is a social shopping platform that combines social networking features with a robust shopping experience.

Users rate brands, review and share deals, and follow merchants to acquire virtual currency for access to access exclusive offers and contests. They enjoy thousands of online-only specials and cash back on every purchase from hundreds of leading national stores.

Corporations, Social Networks, and Non-Profits can leverage the Revbright platform to build brand loyalty, monetize online properties, and generate new lines of revenue with no ongoing costs. Upload custom themes with your branding, choose your stores, use the email delivery and messaging system to connect with your base, and most of all, mine valuable shopping insights to know your customers like never before.

RevBright is a privately owned, Texas-based company.
